Sentencas: Combined cooling, heating and power system (CCHP) is an efficient alternative for building energy supply.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the advantages of high energy efficiency and low emission for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) make the technology a promising prime mover for CCHP systems.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: In this study, a SOFC based CCHP system design and operation optimization model has been developed using the Mixed Integer Non-linear Programming (MINLP) approach.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: The model provides two capacity sizing options of the fixed size (user specified), and the optimal sizing.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: In the fixed size option, four dispatch strategies are considered, namely baseload, day/night, full-load, and electrical load following.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: In the optimal sizing option, the installed capacity of devices and the dispatch strategy are both optimized.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: Moreover, multi-objective optimizations are also conducted to optimize two conflicting objectives simultaneously by the epsilon-constraint method.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: The optimal results are displayed by Pareto frontiers and the most desired solutions have been identified and verified by two decision-making approaches of LINMAP and TOPSIS.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: To make the model applicable to real world operation, novel constraints including part-load efficiency, equipment on/off, and numbers of start constraints are applied, Finally, the proposed model is applied to a case study of a hospital in Shanghai, China considering state-of-the-art technical specifications, time-of-use energy pricing, and emission factors.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: The results indicate environmental advantages of SOFC based CCHP system.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system

Sentencas: Moreover, the levelized cost of energy (LCOE) identified by the proposed optimal design and dispatch model would be 0.17 $/kWh, which is lower than the conventional energy system.
Titulo: Economic and environmental multi-optimal design and dispatch of solid oxide fuel cell based CCHP system
